actions.description: Build the climate movement by bringing a friend to U.S. Senator Markey’s town hall discussion on the Green New Deal at Somerville High School (81 Highland Ave.) on Thursday, Feb. 13th from 6:30-8:00.  Doors open at 6:00 pm. RSVP here!

Wednesday Feb 5th is the deadline for committees to report out bills and we need to make a final push in support of our legislative priorities!  Please call before 5pm this Wednesday, Feb. 5th!

  • Call Telecom, Utilities & Energy TUE Committee Chairs Rep. Thomas Golden 617-722-2263 and Sen. Michael Barrett 617-722-1572 to urge them to pass H.2810 An Act to Promote Green Infrastructure and Reduce Carbon Emissions and H.2836 / S.1958 An Act Re-Powering MA with 100% Renewable Energy out of committee by Feb. 5th!
  • Call your MA House representative and ask them to contact Rep. Thomas Golden and TUE Committee members and urge them to pass H.2810 and H.2836/S.1958.  
  • Attend the Mass Power Forward Valentine’s Day Action on Feb. 11th from 10am-12:30pm.  RSVP here to join in and celebrate our climate champions!
